data.comment: The match is underway at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
An attacking QPR player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 41, Goal! Lyndon Dykes gives QPR a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
Matt Godden scores with his head for Coventry to level the match at 1-1.
Great play from Ryan Giles to set up the goal.
In the minute 45, Steve Martin blows to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Coventry take a 2-1 lead thanks to Callum O`Hare.
In the minute 60, Coventry's Jordan Shipley has been booked in Birmingham.
Ilias Chair (QPR) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The away team replace Tom Carroll with Paul Smyth.
In the minute 75, Yoann Barbet is on target to level the scores at 2-2.
Mark Warburton is making the team's second substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Dominic Ball replacing Luke Amos.
Mark Warburton (QPR) is making a third substitution, with George Thomas replacing Ilias Chair.
In the minute 84, Coventry's Kyle McFadzean scores with his head to give his side a 3-2 lead.
Gustavo Hamer with an assist there.
Lee Wallace for QPR has been booked by Steve Martin and receives a first yellow card.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Coventry make their first substitution with Ben Sheaf replacing Jordan Shipley.
